nodes.text: The Central Control Computer controlled the Trade Federation Droid Army.
As early as 3951 BBY, the droid control center on the Visionary controlled thousands of droids, on Nar Shaddaa and elsewhere.

Before the Invasion of Naboo, the Trade Federation used battle droids that were all subject to the Central Control Computer. This computer, located on an orbiting command ship or station, allowed the droid control program to instantly relay information and orders from unit to unit no matter where they were on the planet.

The weakness to this system was shown during the Battle of Naboo. Once the Droid Control Ship Vuutun Palaa was destroyed by Anakin Skywalker, all the droids simply froze where they were. Also, if the channels were jammed, the once deadly army would be reduced to pieces of statuary.

This technique would lose favor with CIS battle droids during the Clone Wars. However, the Separatists did equip at least some of their battle droids with separate droid brains so they could continue to provide resistance against GAR forces even after the destruction of the planet's central control computers.
